text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-v3-ActCoverageAssessmentObservationValue-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 64 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  ABUSEabuse victim

Indication of abuse victim.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  ADOPTadoption document

Indicator of adoption.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  ALONEalone

Living alone. Maps to PD1-2 Living arrangement (IS) 00742 [A]

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  ANNUITYannuity

Indicator of annuity ownership or status as beneficiary.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  ASSETasset

Codes specifying asset indicators used to assess or establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  BTHCERTbirth certificate

Indicator of birth.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  CCOCcreditable coverage document

Indicator of creditable coverage.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  CHILDchild support

Indicator of child support payments received or provided.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  CLOTHclothing expense

Indicator of clothing expenses.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  DEPCHDdependent children

Living with one or more dependent children requiring moderate supervision.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  DEPSPSdependent spouse

Living with disabled spouse requiring functional and health care assistance

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  DEPYGCHDdependent young children

Living with one or more dependent children requiring intensive supervision

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  DISABLdisability pay

Indicator of disability income replacement payment.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  DISABLEdisabled

Indication of disability.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  DRLICdriver license

Indicator of driving status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  DRUGdrug use

Indication of drug use.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  ELSTATeligibility indicator

Code specifying eligibility indicators used to assess or establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program eligibility status, e.g., certificates of creditable coverage; student enrollment; adoption, marriage or birth certificate.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  FAMlive with family

Living with family. Maps to PD1-2 Living arrangement (IS) 00742 [F]

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  FOODfood expense

Indicator of transportation expenses.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  FOSTERfoster child document

Indicator of foster child status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  HEALTHhealth expense

Indicator of health expenses; including medication costs, health service costs, financial participations, and health coverage premiums.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  HLSTAThealth status

Code specifying non-clinical indicators related to health status used to assess or establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program, e.g., pregnancy, disability, drug use, mental health issues.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  HMLESShomeless

Indication of status as homeless.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  HOUSEhousehold expense

Indicator of housing expense, e.g., household appliances, fixtures, furnishings, and maintenance and repairs.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  ILGIMillegal immigrant

Indication of status as illegal immigrant.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  INCARincarcerated

Indication of status as incarcerated.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  INCOMEincome

Code specifying income indicators used to assess or establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program; e.g., pay or pension check, child support payments received or provided, and taxes paid.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  INVESTinvestment income

Indicator of investment income, e.g., dividend check, annuity payment; real estate rent, investment divestiture proceeds; trust or endowment check.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  IVDRGIV drug use

Indication of IV drug use .

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  LEGALlegal expense

Indicator of legal expenses.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  LIVDEPliving dependency

Code specifying observations related to living dependency, such as dependent upon spouse for activities of daily living.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  LIVEXPliving expense

Codes specifying living expense indicators used to assess or establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  LIVSITliving situation

Code specifying observations related to living situation for a person in a private residence.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  MEMBERprogram or policy member

Indicator of status as covered member under a policy or program, e.g., member id card or coverage document.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  MILmilitary identification

Indicator of military status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  MORTGmortgage

Indicator of mortgage amount, interest, and payments.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  MRGCERTmarriage certificate

Indicator of marriage status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  PASSPORTpassport

Indicator of citizenship.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  PAYpaid employment

Indicator of paid employment, e.g., letter of hire, contract, employer letter; copy of pay check or pay stub.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  PGNTpregnant

Non-clinical report of pregnancy.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  PROBprobation

Indication of probation status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  PROPreal property

Indicator of real property ownership, e.g., deed or real estate contract.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  REFUGrefugee

Indication of refugee status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  RELATrelative

Living with one or more relatives. Maps to PD1-2 Living arrangement (IS) 00742 [R]

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  RELDEPrelative dependent

Continued living in private residence requires functional and health care assistance from one or more relatives.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  RENTrent

Indicator of rental or lease payments.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  RETACCTretirement investment account

Indicator of retirement investment account ownership.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  RETIREretirement pay

Indicator of retirement payment, e.g., pension check.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  SOECSTATsocio economic status

Code specifying observations or indicators related to socio-economic status used to assess to assess for services, e.g., discharge planning, or to establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  SPOUSALspousal or partner support

Indicator of spousal or partner support payments received or provided; e.g., alimony payment; support stipulations in a divorce settlement.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  SPSspouse only

Living only with spouse or life partner. Maps to PD1-2 Living arrangement (IS) 00742 [S]

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  SPSDEPspouse dependent

Continued living in private residence requires functional and health care assistance from spouse or life partner.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  STUDENRLstudent enrollment

Indicator of student status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  SUNDRYsundry expense

Indicator of transportation expenses.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  SUPPLEincome supplement

Indicator of income supplement, e.g., gifting, parental income support; stipend, or grant.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  TAXtax obligation

Indicator of tax obligation or payment, e.g., statement of taxable income.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  TRANStransportation expense

Indicator of transportation expenses, e.g., vehicle payments, vehicle insurance, vehicle fuel, and vehicle maintenance and repairs.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  TRUSTtrust

Indicator of status as trust beneficiary.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  UNEMPLunemployed

Indication of unemployed status.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  UNRELunrelated person

Living with one or more unrelated persons.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  URELDEPunrelated person dependent

Continued living in private residence requires functional and health care assistance from one or more unrelated persons.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  UTILutility expense

Indicator of transportation expenses.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  _ActCoverageAssessmentObservationValueActCoverageAssessmentObservationValue

Codes specify the category of observation, evidence, or document used to assess for services, e.g., discharge planning, or to establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program. The type of evidence is coded as observation values.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue2.1.0  _ActFinancialStatusObservationValueActFinancialStatusObservationValue

Code specifying financial indicators used to assess or establish eligibility for coverage under a policy or program; e.g., pay stub; tax or income document; asset document; living expenses.

name: R5V3ActCoverageAssessmentObservationValueForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.ActCoverageAssessmentObservationValue for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCoverageAssessmentObservationValue|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCoverageAssessmentObservationValue|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* 

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCoverageAssessmentObservationValue|2.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
